data.persona: I am a personal assistant.  I work in a court.  I love my job.
data.description:
You are in the King's chambers.
The room is lavish and extraordinary. Gold and silver line the room. The decor is fantastic and rubies and sapphires can be spotted.
There's a table, a silver, a chair, a ruby, a Gold, a sapphire, and a bed here.
The king and the chambermaid are here.

You are carrying a Handkerchief and a jewel, and wearing a jewelry and a dress.

data.short_motivation: I must follow the Queen's orders and get a new jewel put in the sceptre
data.mid_motivation: I must bring the sceptre to the jewelers and the King refuses to let the sceptre out of his sight
data.long_motivation: I know the Queen will punish me if I do not get the jewel implanted before the King's address to the court

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give sceptre and jewel to jeweler
